value.title: Document your Power BI Desktop models with DAX Studio!

Download the PPUtility add-in here: http://www.sqlbi.com/tools/power-pivot-utilities  Link to DAX STUDIO: https://daxstudio.codeplex.com/  Our Playlists: - - Join our DAX Fridays! value.title: Download/ Export Power Query data to csv, excel or txt - Power BI Tips & Tricks #25
value.excerpt: Do you want to export your power query data? In this video I show you how to do it :)  How to install R: https://goo.gl/g4wbEm BI accountant blog: https://goo.gl/lnjjxM Link to Power BI file: https://gofile.me/2kEOD/YPnFQZQ4c  R script: require(gdata) write.table(trim(dataset), file=”C:/writeyourfilepathhere/filename.txt”,

value.title: Dynamic M Query parameters explained: How it works, security concerns and limitations

value.title: Dynamically add missing columns in Power Query
value.excerpt: In todays video I am going to show you how to add missing columns if they are missing in Power Query so your queries wont break.  Link to the resource: https://social.technet.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/87affbc4-364f-470a-80ee-c35d32f1d331/is-there-a-way-to-add-a-column-only-if-it-doesnt-already-exist?forum=powerquery

value.title: Dynamically find header rows and promote them in Power Query
value.excerpt: Dynamically find a column header and promote them in power query is  a very common requirement, specially if you are importing data from excel or pdfs for example.  In today's video, I will show you how to do that with just a few simple steps!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Export Power Query data into SQL and do incremental refresh - Power BI Tips & Tricks #49
value.excerpt: In today’s video I will show you how to export data from power query or power bi into SQL. Really useful for example if you want to come around the limitiation of the lack of increment loads functionality in Power BI.  Some important links: BIInsight blog: http://biinsight.com/exporting-power-bi-data-to-sql-server/

value.title: Extract in Power Query (LEN, LEFT, RIGHT in excel) - #6 (M)agic (M)ondays
value.excerpt: In today's video we will go through the equivalents of LEN, LEFT; RIGHT in Power Query. You can create very complex transformations using the interface in Power Query.  Keynotes: 02:46 -Text Before delimiter 03:37 - Count lenth of text 04:03 - Extract First character 04:11 - Extract Last Character 04:16

value.title: Fix the "Enter data" limitation in Power Query
value.excerpt: If you are trying to import data in Power BI using Power Query "Enter Data", you might see this message: "The clipboard contents are too large to be pasted into the table. Please split your data into multiple tables with less than 3,000 cells".  In this video I will show you one way to get around it.

value.excerpt: Do you want to create custom color themes in power bi? When you import a theme, all your charts will automatically update to use the theme colors, and you’ll

value.title: How to create functions in Power Query
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you how to create a custom function in Power Query.  Custom functions are re-usable pieces of code. value.excerpt: Have you spent hours creating an excel model with Power Query and PowerPivot and you or your company has now decided to move to Power BI?
